name: pud_level_06
text: I need a new pair of pants!
text_simple: i need a new pair of pants

name: pud_level_07
text: Just popped the last of me buttons.
text_simple: just popped the last of me buttons

name: pud_level_08
text: Ho, my blades are nice and sharp now.
text_simple: ho my blades are nice and sharp now

name: pud_level_09
text: Time for a choppin block party!
text_simple: time for a choppin block party

name: pud_level_11
text: Have you seen my right hook?
text_simple: have you seen my right hook

name: pud_kill_01
text: Oh, I love a good slaughter.
text_simple: oh i love a good slaughter
pretty_criteria: Spawning in the loadout|Killing a hero

name: pud_kill_07
text: You'll look good with an apple in yer mouth!
text_simple: youll look good with an apple in yer mouth

name: pud_kill_10
text: Ha ha ha I'm just ribbin' ya!
text_simple: ha ha ha im just ribbin ya

name: pud_rival_01
text: No choice cuts here, this meat's gone a bit off.
text_simple: no choice cuts here this meats gone a bit off

name: pud_rival_02
text: Spare ribs? Not what I had in mind.
text_simple: spare ribs not what i had in mind

name: pud_rival_03
text: Hm hm hm hm hm. You need some meat on them bones, Clinkz.
text_simple: hm hm hm hm hm you need some meat on them bones clinkz

name: pud_rival_04
text: You call him Prophet. I call him roughage.
text_simple: you call him prophet i call him roughage

name: pud_rival_05
text: Boiling you up with drawn butter!
text_simple: boiling you up with drawn butter

name: pud_rival_06
text: Hm, I always liked red meat.
text_simple: hm i always liked red meat

name: pud_rival_07
text: Hey, bottom feeder, I likes my meat fresh.
text_simple: hey bottom feeder i likes my meat fresh

name: pud_rival_08
text: Eh, fish don't hardly count as meat.
text_simple: eh fish dont hardly count as meat

name: pud_rival_09
text: The only thing you broke was my fast, Spirit Breaker.
text_simple: the only thing you broke was my fast spirit breaker

name: pud_rival_10
text: I do all me own dirty work, Al.
text_simple: i do all me own dirty work al

name: pud_rival_14
text: That's what you get, taking a bite out of my turf.
text_simple: thats what you get taking a bite out of my turf

name: pud_rival_18
text: Ah, choice cut of wolf steak.
text_simple: ah choice cut of wolf steak

name: pud_rival_19
text: Hm, a bit of venison oughta hit the spot.
text_simple: hm a bit of venison oughta hit the spot

name: pud_death_03
text: Don't mean to cut and run...
text_simple: dont mean to cut and run

name: pud_death_10
text: Chop me up small...I'd do the same for you!
text_simple: chop me up small id do the same for you

name: pud_respawn_04
text: I'm like a bad meal. Ya can't keep me down.
text_simple: im like a bad meal ya cant keep me down

name: pud_respawn_08
text: Well, I needed to sharpen me cutlery anyway.
text_simple: well i needed to sharpen me cutlery anyway

name: pud_deny_03
text: Snatched it right outta yer mouth!
text_simple: snatched it right outta yer mouth

name: pud_deny_09
text: I'm a greedy guts, I admit it.
text_simple: im a greedy guts i admit it

name: pud_rare_01
text: Sweetbreads ain't sweet and they ain't bread...and they need a butcher, not a baker.
text_simple: sweetbreads aint sweet and they aint bread and they need a butcher not a baker

name: pud_rare_02
text: When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie.
text_simple: when im through with these vermin theyll be fit for a pie

name: pud_rare_03
text: Only trouble with carrion...an hour after eating you're hungry again!
text_simple: only trouble with carrion an hour after eating youre hungry again

name: pud_rare_05
text: Nothing better than a nice raw liver.
text_simple: nothing better than a nice raw liver

name: pud_rare_07
text: Oh, a battlefield is truly a wonderland!
text_simple: oh a battlefield is truly a wonderland

text_simple: my cleavers edge will never dull

name: pud_invis_02
